items.question: How does the review system work?
items.answer: Vokabulo calculates intervals based on your answers. Confident words appear less often; tricky ones show up more until they stick.

items.question: Does it work offline?
items.answer: Yes. Your progress is cached and syncs automatically once you're back online.

items.question: Can I import my own lists?
items.answer: Import CSV files or share existing lists with your team. Vokabulo handles duplicates and structure.

items.question: How does the AI pronunciation feedback work?
items.answer: Our engine analyzes your speech in real-time, comparing your intonation and accent with native speakers to give you an instant accuracy score.
